title: Getting ready for the QGIS User Conference 2026?
content:
We’ve just added conference rates to the recommended accommodation options in Laax!

Joining for the conference, the contributor meeting, or both? You can now start planning your stay using the booking links on the conference website. Conference rates are valid 2–11 October 2026.

Looking forward to bringing the QGIS community together in the Swiss Alps - see you in LAAX!

Double-click this entry for more info!
